trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required of a service for providing access to a data source at the `EnvDTE.Project` level.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, creates and returns an instance of the given data source, and adds it to the design surface.

You should only call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.AddDataSourceInstance%2A> method on data sources that are designable for example, if the<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor.IsDesignable%2A> value is `true`.
This method enables the service implementer to perform custom actions when a data source is added to the design surface.
The designer host.
The data source.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing an instance of the added data source.
The type name cannot be created or resolved.
When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the collection of data sources at the `EnvDTE.Project` level.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref>, or `null` if there are no data sources at the `EnvDTE.Project` level.
When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Add New Data Source Wizard**.
The parent window.
The initial position of a form.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> collection of newly added data sources, or `null` if no data sources are added.
When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Configure Data Source** dialog box on the specified data source.
The parent window.
The initial position of a form.
The data source.
`true` if any changes were made to that data source; otherwise, `false`.
The specified data source is invalid or `null`.
When overridden in a derived class, notifies the service that a component representing a data source was added to the design surface.
The data source component.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports adding a new data source using <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition)"></xref>.

`true` if the service supports adding a new data source using <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition)"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports configuring data sources using <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition,System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor)"></xref>.

`true` if the service supports configuring a data source using <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition,System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor)"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
